Naysawn's Blog

home

Hometown: Calgary, Alberta

Occupation: CTO at Regalii.

Get in touch: naysawn at gmail dot com

Bio: Naysawn specializes in technology for social enterprises and is currently the Chief Technology Officer at Regalii.com.  Previously he founded and ran startups including Art Sumo, and The Hack Academy.  In a previous life Naysawn was a Program Manager at Microsoft where he helped to define the Windows 8 developer experience and build Microsoft Test Professional.   He has a B.Eng in Electrical Engineer from McGill University.
